name: Run the Mansion
description:
The owner of an old decrepit mansion, Lord Egor Vile, has recently got his hands on a highly valuable jewel. If he’s allowed to use it to make a profit, he may end up with enough stockpiled money to take over the entire world. It is your job to steal it before he can, though you can’t do it alone. Little do you know, this will go all according to his plan…

Run the Mansion is a Local Co-op Puzzle game for 2 players. One player runs through the mansion’s several rooms with the limited information their surroundings provide. The second player looks through cameras and controls drones to get a birds-eye view, acquiring information that the runner wouldn’t be able to get by themselves. Each room in the mansion has its own tricks and puzzles within, so let’s hope you don’t get caught.
